white: Putting a glory hole in the penalty box.
The last time the Leafs won the Cup.
Meeting your true love at the Olympics.
Making interviews with Pierre McGuire even more awkward.
Nicklas Backstrom with a lapful of tiny puppies.
Two game misconducts and a $20,000 fine.
Riding Brandon Bollig's beard into the sunset.
People who are mean to Jamie Benn.
Concealing an erection in your cup.
Not wearing anything under your hockey gear.
Moving Canadian teams to states that don't even like hockey.
The greatest bromance of the NHL.
Invasive personal questions from sports journalists.
Moving the Coyotes to Quebec City.
Taking stupid penalties in the last two minutes of a tie game.
Zdeno Chara getting jerseyed by Jeff Skinner.
Carey Price naked on a horse.
The extremely efficient underground Russian rumor mill.
Getting a five-minute major six seconds into the first period.
The general misogyny inherent in professional sports.
The Leafs being in a playoff spot.
Anze Kopitar not winning the Selke.
Shutting down a team 5-0 while playing an AHL goalie and your bottom 6 forwards.
A third-string goaltender, two rookies, and the Zamboni driver.
Surreptitiously checking out your teammate's junk in the showers.

Getting bag skated to Celine Dion's greatest hits.

Seeing yourself and your liney on the KissCam.

The overwhelming stench of hockey equipment.
Changing your jersey to your couple portmanteau.
Firing Mike Millbury into the sun.
Losing a faceoff to an eight-year-old in her mom's hockey gear.
Making hockey as unfun as possible.
Calling up your entire farm team over the course of December.
Your whole team getting strep throat from the same Edmonton Oiler.
A hybrid hockey stick and cattle prod.
Inducting Gabriel Landeskog into the NHL Hot Dads Club.
The life-changing sight of 6'9" Zdeno Chara doing 33 perfect pull-ups in a banana hammock speedo.
Tearing your ACL doing downward-facing dog.
Giving your d-man soul mate your teeth.
Pierre McGuire's unhealthy attraction to hockey musk.
The Florida Panthers actually filling their arena with fans.
Explaining the statistical irrelevance of plus/minus stats.
Lying about your height and weight on NHL.com.
Getting booed at the Wells Fargo Center.
Spending so much time learning about Fenwick scores that you dream about math.
Taylor Hall and Jordan Eberle's  former "bachelor pad".
Throwing a live chicken on the ice.
The Olympic Village's entire supply of condoms.
Throwing popcorn at players you don't like.
"How To Come Out Without Actually Coming Out," by Jamie Benn and Tyler Seguin.
More gold medals than the Canadian Women's Olympic Hockey team.
Pulling a groin muscle doing a celly.
Volunteering for someone else's hockey school in your spare time.
Dropping a pass in a clutch moment.
Having to get your jeans specially tailored.
Going from 0 to 4 kids in 3 years.
The Sedin twins' creepy telepathy thing.
Literally undressing your teammate during practice.
The Vancouver Stanley Cup riots of 2011.
A baby in the Stanley Cup.
A crippling addiction to NHL Twitter feeds.
Why Atlanta lost its NHL franchise.
Forgetting to put blades in your skates.
Trading your top goal scorer for a fourth-round pick.
A too many men on the ice penalty.
Actually considering buying a Marchand shirt.
Wearing a Hawaiian shirt to the NHL awards.
Bringing your mom as a date to your BFF's Cup party.
Kidnapping Gary Bettman and putting him in the trunk of your car.
"You gotta get it up, Daddy!" - Segs to Demers, for real.
A secret shrine to Wayne Gretzky.
Getting a DUI on a Zamboni.
Getting arrested on Canada Day for grabbing a cop's butt.
Putting a hockey team somewhere they don't have ice.
Knocking out half his own team with his slap shot.
Holding the league record for own goals.
Three major injuries in four seasons.
Unexpectedly having feelings about the Oilers.
The New York Islanders' win-loss record.
Moving to Germany to play hockey with your secret husband and his three clones.
Forgetting the Coyotes are an actual NHL team.
Running a hockey school in your spare time.
